website_summaries.verdict: You get what you pay for with this powerful upper body workout station.
pros: Stable all around, even for bigger bodies
Complete upper body workout and then some, with this machine
cons: Some pieces need to be unscrewed in order to make adjustments for different exercises

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't aske for a better machine .. excellent
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with the package, it was delivered in perfect condition. Parts were easy to assembly thanks to the clear instructions. The machine is very strong and despite what I was thinking at the beginning it is way better. I used form day one and in very few hours, with a quick search on web, I found a variety of exercises I could do with it. You can regulate how high you need to be with a quick twist. This is a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GAS

customer_reviews.title: Solid Power Tower for home gym!
customer_reviews.text: The HARISON Multifunction Power Tower with Bench Home is indeed a solidly built equipment. The carbon black coated steel bars are heavy and well made. If you are comfortable with putting together stuff purchased from ikea, you will have no problem piecing this equipment together. All tools needed to install the gym are included. The installation can be done by one person but a team of 2 should be able to finish the job in < 45 minutes (excluding unboxing and removing the various pieces from the box)..
customer_reviews.author: Wong of SF

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. Gives a real good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very study. It's not super easy to remove the bench as shown in the picture though. It has to be unscrewed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing my family loves it . This was a nice addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.author: Shalei Love

customer_reviews.title: No pain no gain
customer_reviews.text: Loved it great home work out machine. It is sturdy and doesn’t take up too much space. It has helped the family get in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is definitely a two person job! Good piece of equipment but I wish the base was just a wee bit wider to improve its stability. Works as advertised though...All you have to do is not let it turn into a dust collector
customer_reviews.author: RJ Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: No where in the advertisement for this product did I see a weight limit of 220 lbs. -- I t want till the product arrived that I noticed this in the assembly instructions. I am 6'4" 250 -- so everything but the pull up bar works well -- while I can use it now I know that over time it will weaken
customer_reviews.author: John campbell

customer_reviews.title: If you are not too large this is a good machine. If you are taller than 6 foot keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Equipment broke at the back pad from use. It sheared right at the weld on the leg-lift back pad cross bar. Good machine and would work if you have a fast paced schedule but, the quality of material and fact I have used this for less than 2 years intermittantly and it is already coming apart, I would pass on this purchase if I had to do it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Blancett

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The adjustment bolt for the upper tower came cross threaded making any adjustment impossible by hand. The seller wanted me to disassemble the item and box it back up for a refund. WTF?!?!? This thing took a couple hours to assemble and they want it returned? I just wanted a reasonable discount given on a defective item. Very poor customer service. No accommodation on their part, so they get a poor review in return. Horrible business practice. Don’t order this item.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: A solid 4 Stars, only missing a bit of stability and a couple of handle covers.
customer_reviews.text: I had the unit professionally assembled, so I cannot rate the ease or relative difficulty of assembly. The bench component adapts easily to exercise requirements and the knee raise, pull up and chin up stations function beautifully as does the sit-up configuration. My only hesitation in giving 5 stars to this equipment is a bit of jiggle and instability when using the dip bars. Also, the handles are widely spaced and more appropriate to a taller person (over 6’). Lastly, the dip handles would benefit from thicker rubberized cushioning sleeves. Overall though, it is a fine piece of equipment that should provide years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Creek

customer_reviews.title: All In One Gym
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes this bench because its got so many functions...yet it's so compact it fits in his room. So can therefore have the privacy of working out morning or night without disturbing anyone
customer_reviews.author: Asela M.

customer_reviews.title: Capacity is 300lbs not 500 lbs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Says over 500 lbs capacity but the product has a sticker that says capacity is 300. I weigh 250 and it does not feel stable at all
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Work Out Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who overall is very pleased with the unit. His only issue was that it came scratched from the manufacturer and a few screws were difficult to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: SEF818

customer_reviews.title: Great exercise tower, inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, relatively easy to install.Our whole family uses it for different exercises. We are all happy
customer_reviews.author: Kaarina

customer_reviews.title: Good and strong
customer_reviews.text: Good and strong for chin ups although would have preferred rubber on the grip areas Ab sit up area well designed but a little hard to do side to side as dip bars impede full movement . Dip bar strong but you will get the most wobble from the unit in spite of the levelers ( one was damaged in shipping and screw was dislodged from leveler so no way to attach to unit . Bench is good but quite difficult to enter for inverted sit ups and place feet ankles with in the foam rollers They are quite uncomfortable when doing sit ups that way Push up bars are fine
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: You can find better for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tower is over priced. The quality of materials leaves something to be desired. The tower is also a bit unstable. The base supports bow upwards from the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Not 500 weight capacity as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product says weight capacity of 500 pounds in the product description. We bought it because of that. The sticker on the equipment says 300 pounds max capacity. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Home Workout Equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised of how easy it was to assemble and how great the quality it was, but I was really amazed with how the equipment really got me motivated to exercise everyday. With a busy schedule, it feels great to come home and work out right in my living room. The Power Tower has so many functions that I really get to work every single part of my body, especially my arms. It's helping me get back in shape!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy instruction, and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Took 2 people to assemble it, and turned out very sturdy. The bench can be secured upward with the two elastic stripes came with the box, and the technique is not suggested by the company but turned out very functional and easy to use. Value of the money give 4 stars because not sure if it’s actually worth 500 bucks for this equipment compared to other $200-300 products on the market, especially considering COVID situation and all the other power tower were out of stock... so the high value could be the supply is insufficient compared to the market demand. Overall- this is a good power tower. Glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not the highest of quality but it sure is well made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Took me an hour to put together by myself. Instructions were clear and enough for me (I am handy though and I know my way around these things) Good bang for the buck. It's simple, utilitarian and well built. Not 100% highest quality well built, but for the price I paid, I think this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: I. C. Onur

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money!! Missing 2 legs for the undercarriage... Could not even assemble unit without them... Obviously NO quality control...
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, is kind of wobbly but I am 6'5 235 and the max weight is 220. So considering that it holds up pretty darn good! All in all a great piece of exercise equipment to keep at home and help get rid of the dad bod.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon James Jebb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, for the most part...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was a bit rough upon shipment, both inside and outside of box. The most frustrating part, however, was one part didn't line up with the holes. Instead of returning the whole item or even just the part I spent some time widening the holes with a drill to make it fit. Directions themselves are a bit too simple as the descriptions are quite hard to understand, best to just go through the picture and make it work that way. Seems sturdy enough though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: support bar for leg lift backrest is thin!!
customer_reviews.text: After the first week of use. Harison power tower seems to be sturdy. There are areas of concern that could be problematic. 1. Welds are not complete. Areas that bear weight should be better reinforced. 2. Supporting bar behind leg lift backrest is too thin and from research have been known to snap on other consumer reviews. 3. For the high price...this product should be strong in all areas!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Use the tools it came with.
customer_reviews.text: We like it but now know to not use other tools we have to hurry and build it. We should of used the tools it came with to tighten the bolts. Cheap melt bc we used our tools to tighten it and bent then metal but now we know it’s sturdy. Looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles &.

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and put it together. Overall the instructions were easy(ish). The directions could be a little bit more clear and the pictures a little larger for clarity. The stand itself seem to be pretty sturdy, may need to tweak the foot pegs to make it solid. I was able to do a pull-up and a dip without the stand from moving to much. Overall I think this is really a nice addition to the home gym.
customer_reviews.author: David Levoyer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine, yet it is not really stable if you have it on a hard floor.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine, yet it is not really stable if you have it on a hard floor. You have to be very careful with how you tighten those bottom screws. The pins that lock in the seat from underneath are somewhat pointless and annoying to fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Smith

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot of uses and functions with this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: As can be seen in the video the unit comes with a lot of different ways to exercise. I forgot to put the pins in the bench when I was lowering it in the video. If they are inserted the bench is very sturdy and useful for inclined sit ups. As a whole the unit is well made and strong. I have enjoyed it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Keller

customer_reviews.title: 6 Packs Machine!
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 weeks to be shipped, 3.1/2 weeks to arrive.... but once here I was very happy! Already 4 days working on it 3 hours a day & my 6 Packs is already coming back!
customer_reviews.author: HUGHES LONGELIN

customer_reviews.title: The assembly was definitely worth the sweat 👍
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble so long as you use the correct holes on the very first connection. I didn't realize it was wrong until I went to connect the handle bars. So a little more clarity would be most helpful. As well as the direction of #6. The connection was squeezed together so I needed to torque it open. Otherwise, I'm very pleased how sturdy it is and I'm very excited to incorporate it into my daily workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Boston Cardiel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a multi function workout gym and found it. This product was easy to install and is sturdy. I love that the bench can decline and fold up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: TristaC

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid work out station. Good quality and pretty stable with a 165 lbs. 6’ tall guy on it. If you have a socket set it will cut your assembly time down drastically.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No need to go to Gym
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this for about one month. We enjoy so much and has everything that you need for the work out. We have cancelled our Gym membership. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How Can I Contact directly?
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even get a chance to assemble. I received all parts for tower but with instructions and tools to put together a metal platform bed.?!? I now have emailed the company and waiting for response...
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s better quality than I expected at the price. My husband is 220 lbs and he can do dips without it tipping. The bench is a little short but overall the quality is good. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of workout equipment, I love it. I'm curious though as the ankle piece (padding for situps) is angled on the video but mine is straight down??? Weird but other than that. I love it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pernell A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with the quality of the product. It's very well made and is very versatile to provide a really great workout. Just add dumbbells and a water bottle and you'll be in great shape in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: When this came in the mail I was a bit overwhelmed and thought I would have to hire someone to built it. I was wrong The video online made putting this together so easy and fast It’s a great machine and does what it’s suppose to
customer_reviews.author: Daphna

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great addition to a small gym space. Lots of workouts and doesn't take up much space. One of the arms had a cut in it and I contact the dealer and they replaced it without question or charge! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Overall positively impressed !
customer_reviews.text: This one is the best constructed one I've found. IS sturdy and easy to mount. Mounting instructions are very good and easy to set up. Is important to choose a flat hard surface to place it. Leveling is also very important. Only wath detail is the weight you can place on the recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio P.

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy workout station
customer_reviews.text: Good product so far. Frame feels very sturdy. The arm rests on the dip bars are a bit small and sometimes hard to stay on. Would be better if they were curved. The bench also wobbles a bit but not too bad. Overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RandD

customer_reviews.title: Great pice of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. Works exactly how it should. I don't have a very big apartment but it fits very well. Easy to put together only took about 40 mins. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Felecia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great stability
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Really good instructions on how to assemle it. Excellent stability when performing pull ups and dips. Only issue was that the attachment where the bench is connected to the power tower came in bent, so I cannot attach the bench to it because it does not physically fit.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Meets Every Expectation
customer_reviews.text: The Harison Power Tower was a little more expensive than others I looked at but its quality, sturdiness and stability are unmatched for a home unit. My only wish was for the bench to be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: The Lion King

customer_reviews.title: Results Driven
customer_reviews.text: The product is a must have for home workouts, Everyone knows the benefits of this equipment, so in the gym everyone wants to use it. Causing great time delays. So, having my own at home is a life saver and time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble. Started using it right away. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and it is very functional. So many excersizes we can do with it. Our whole famliy loves Harison rower. We staying home due to covid, and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble with clear instructions. Good value compared to much more expensive alternatives. Adjustments are simple and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Pace

customer_reviews.title: Good product and prompt customer service
customer_reviews.text: Dip bar station went together quickly and is very sturdy. Found that 1 rubber end cap was missing. Contacted customer service and they promptly shipped a new one to me at no charge. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sievert

customer_reviews.title: Great product but there's always room for improvements
customer_reviews.text: the material is great and it looks sturdy and durable. The only thing that maybe needs improvement is the design of the pull up part. I keep hitting the bench even when it's folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed El-Banna

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with initial usage
customer_reviews.text: Product came with no issues, no damage and assembled relatively easily. Product originally advertised 500lbs capacity on Amazon but sticker on product states 300lbs capacity
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine!!! I assembled it by myself and its met all expectations and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha O.

customer_reviews.title: Stop scrolling, buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with it, actually impressed considering I got it for a great price during this pandemic and it arrived quick. Good piece of equipment to have around!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Hageman

customer_reviews.title: strong
customer_reviews.text: is a good and strong machine, my kids and I are working out.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! This is a great strong piece of equipment! I had a couple parts missing and Sarah is replacing them for me. Great service !!! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Spinney

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but wish it were a little more sturdy. Not to be confused, it’s a good product
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Vooda

customer_reviews.title: Great tower - sturdy for heavy person (210 lbs.) and also for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: We love our Harison multi-function tower - it is sturdy (I am 210 lb. male) and our whole family uses it since it offers so much functionality.
customer_reviews.author: C & S

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put together. Quality is much better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POWER TOWER POWER
customer_reviews.text: The Power Tower is one of the best purchases yet. Both my husband and I are able to get a full body workout. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne M. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Machine very convenient and strong
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was super slow but machine itself it’s strong and convenient good brand thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to do pull ups on, this is great, with many other exercise options also.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Find YouTube Assembly video
customer_reviews.text: Once you find the assembly video on YouTube it’s simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’ve used it several times already and love, love, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: allen p israelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Found it very sturdy and simple to assemble. Great workout
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY W CAGLE

customer_reviews.title: Good deal overall
customer_reviews.text: Great overall arm cushions could be a bit more comfy but a good
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a gift for my hubby and he loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Shalika fuquay

product_meta.title: HARISON Multifunction Power Tower Pull Up Dip Station with Bench Adjustable Height for Home Gym Strength Training Fitness Equipment
feature_bullets: 【FAMILY WORKOUT】Multi-functional, Compact and Foldable Design suitable for Family Workout
【100% PROMISE】 Please send us messages if any questions, 100% satisfy promised!
【HARISON ORIGINAL PRODUCT】 Real picture shooting, No exaggerating. What you see is what you get!

【Multi-function Power Tower Exercise Equipment】It is a multi-functional dip station that supports vertical knee raise, push-ups, dips as well as pull-ups, which help tone and target your arms, core, shoulders, chest, and back for a stronger upper bodyWith a variety of station and positions, you can all-around training abdominal muscles, arm, back, chest, shoulders and leg muscles

【Ergonomic Design】The removable weight bench and backrest provide flexibility during your strength training workout, The sit up bench could be decline , flat and collapsible.You can easily to fold up the bench if you donnot need it by insert the plug pin

【Solid Build Workout Tower】Heavy duty powder coated steel tube frame and non-slip foot sets make the stability, Customized design with back cushion and elbow pads, Gym-level construction with foam rollers for real comfort，136cm extended curved base with 4 powerful sunction caps and multiple stable anti-skid cross bar, all these designs of this home gym equipment highlight the stability and safety to avoid any wobble.

【Compact and Utility】 Every design of this exercise equipment is simple. It takes the compact space to use and can be collected in any room or garage. HARISON pull up and dip bar station have 4 adjustable height from 70.47 - 88.19 inches ,Over 500LBS high capacity.
【RISK- FREE】 : 30 days return ,1 year for the whole free standing power tower , responsible for any damage, Fitness gift for the one who you love
